headline: India's Infosys rises after strong 2026 view; lifts IT index
summary: Infosys rose 5% on Friday after unexpectedly raising its fiscal 2026 revenue forecast, pointing to a ​possible turnaround for India's $283 billion IT industry as AI-led partnerships ‌drive deals.  Shares of India's No.2 software services exporter led gains on the Nifty ‌50 index  with its strongest intraday rise in four months and lifted the Nifty IT sub-index 2.2% higher.  Infosys's push for vendor consolidation is boosting growth prospects, while its AI library is strengthening its position as ⁠clients expand account sizes ‌during renewals, Morningstar said.
